column5: well i had a few hrs to kill this morn !!! so i said to myself"its been awhiile i think i'll go fishin" lol interesting obsevations today!!! seen a few wakes goin up but alot more goin down and not stoppin!!! hense first drift i nail a dropback!!! did ok today and lost 5!!! morn was good but waters cleared real fast!!!     BIG MALE  SAME FISH LANDED
Nice job!!  Love reading your reports CC!

Nice work Scott!  I was wondering what the trib conditions were like...looks like the little rain we did get didn't blow the rivers out.  I wish I could pull them out of the river like you do....wow...what a talent you have.
Scott, I would think that by now you'd be sick of catching Steelhead? After landing 2 or 3 thousand of them...
Well done scott,as usual   nice looking fish,and thanks for the report,.  ...man you are sure killing those silvers this spring thats for sure.....cheers
TX GUYS!!! CAN NEVER GET TIRED OF STEEL PIGEON  LOL  BACK TO WORK SOON SO I GOT TO GET ALL THE FISHIN IN I CAN  LOL
